column4: hi, can anyone help me, i have just installed ubuntu on friends laptop for him, its a toshiba a-100 583, everything has worked perfectly,  except that there are some music keys on the left of the keyboard, they aren't Fn modifed keys and im not sure how to get them to work does anyone have any idea?
yeah.. i can help..just wait a sec i have to find it first..
go to system-->Preferences-->keyboard shortcuts.. there u can set whatever keys u want
hms.. then i don't know.. i have a microsoft keyboard and it worked fine here..
